metadata.description: Expert automation plugins that turn Claude into a specialist for your team. Install by department to get skills for marketing, sales, operations, creative, and product workflows.

plugins.name: marketing
plugins.description: Rank higher and grow organic traffic with programmatic SEO, technical audits, and Search Console optimization. Create email sequences that convert, build compelling case studies, and generate professional infographics.

plugins.name: sales
plugins.description: Research and score B2B leads, craft personalized outreach sequences, and build client success stories. Turn discovery call transcripts into actionable automation blueprints.

plugins.name: operations
plugins.description: Build, test, and deploy n8n workflows through incremental REST API automation. Convert discovery call transcripts into implementation-ready automation blueprints.

plugins.name: creative
plugins.description: Edit and render videos with FFmpeg and Remotion, from stitching and transitions to captions and teasers. Design presentations in Excalidraw and generate AI-powered infographics.

plugins.name: product
plugins.description: Design presentations, pitch decks, and process diagrams collaboratively in Excalidraw. Turn discovery call transcripts into structured automation blueprints your team can implement.
